tasks.name: define project
tasks.prompt: Generate a comprehensive project definition including goals, scope, and technologies involved.

tasks.name: generate idea
tasks.prompt: Provide innovative project ideas within the tech domain, focusing on current trends.

tasks.name: create code
tasks.prompt: Generate starter code snippets for a given project idea, ensuring best practices are followed.

tasks.name: test code
tasks.prompt: Outline a testing strategy for the project, including unit tests and integration tests.

tasks.name: debug code
tasks.prompt: Identify potential bugs in the given code snippets and provide fixes.

tasks.name: refine code
tasks.prompt: Refine and optimize the code, enhancing readability and performance.

tasks.name: document code
tasks.prompt: Extract docstrings from the code and compile them into a Markdown document.

tasks.name: finalize project
tasks.prompt: Summarize the project completion, including final testing, documentation, and deployment steps.
